name: Insert Script In Headers And Footers
author: Geek Code Lab

sections.description:
Using this smart plugin, allows you to insert Google analytics code, Facebook pixel code, custom style, javascript and more in your WordPress header, footer and body. no need to edit the theme!

you can add custom scripts easily from the admin side

Plugin Features

  • Quick to set up
  • Simple to insert scripts
  • Insert header code and/or footer code
  • Insert Script in Body
  • Add Google Analytics code to any theme
  • Add custom CSS across themes
  • Add any Website tracking code
  • Add Advertisement script code
  • Insert Facebook pixel code
  • Insert any code or script, including HTML and Javascript

Pro Plugin Features

  • Add script to single page priority of loading script.
  • Add header script to a single post, custom post and page.
  • Add Footer script to a single post, custom Post and page.
  • Give Priority to Script(At Beginning or At End)
  • Select where to Show Script – Admin or Front Side
  • Add Script to Post, Custom Post and Page
  • Controlling the priority of loading script code.
  • Basic code editor options

    • Code syntax highlighting
    • Line numbering
    • Active line highlighting
    • Tab indentation
  • Timely support 24/7.
  • Regular updates.
  • Well documented.

GET PRO PLUGIN BUY NOW
sections.installation:
Automatic Installation

This process is safe and easy to install the plugin on your WordPress installation. First, login to your WordPress dashboard, then go to the Plugin menu then click on the Add New option.

Here plugin list page will open, on this page in the search box write the name of the plugin Insert Script In Headers And Footers and press the Search button. After this, you can find our plugin name at the top of the list now just click on the Install button.

Admin Dashboard > Plugins > Add New > Search for Insert Script In Headers And Footers plugin.

Manual Installation

In the manual installation, you have to download our plugin first. Extract the .zip and put the whole contents in the wp-content/plugins/ directory of your WordPress installation and then activate the plugin from the Plugins page.

After activating the plugin, go to Setting > Insert Script In Headers And Footers.

sections.reviews:
Great plugin and great price

By simonvinther on July 17, 2023

This is a good plugin. I upgraded to pro, as it had exactly the features I needed. Although it may sound expensive, it was a very fair price.

I look forward to following the plugin's development. I have been in dialogue with the developer, suggested a few simple improvements. the developer has returned and will implement the suggestions. I believe that this plugin will be among the best on the market. Because it is simple, powerful and easy to understand.

Personally, I would suggest the developer to make a better pricing model. After the upcomming features, the plugin will maybe be too cheap. So after 50.000 installs, the price should go up.
Because: If this were a deal on AppSumo, it would be the most popular WordPress plugin of the month - consider PRO upgrade before it is to late. This is a steal!

doesnt work well with elementor plugin

By daami on September 1, 2022

“The content area has not been found on your page” this is what you get when you activate the plugin after update. otherwise its working fine

Works well, with classic editor required

By johnbroberts on November 16, 2021

I needed the ability to inject OG tags into the header of individual pages. Other plugins have a lot of other functionality that I do not need. This plugin is light and sleek and that is all it does. One thing, and it does it well. I did have to install Classic editor alongside my existing GoodLayers setup. So far it has worked perfectly. I recommend it. I am using version 5.8.2 Tech support was very responsive, and solved my initial issue with the installation I mentioned. Thank you!
